laazotea.indi.client

Interface INDIServerConnectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleINDIClient

    public interface INDIServerConnectionListener
    A interface to be notified about changes in a INDIServerConnection
    Version:
    1.10, March 19, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionLost(INDIServerConnection connection)
      Called when the connection is lost (explicity or not).
      void newDevice(INDIServerConnection connection, INDIDevice device)
      Called when a new Device is added to the Connection.
      void newMessage(INDIServerConnection connection, java.util.Date timestamp, java.lang.String message)
      Called when the message of the Connection is changed.
      void removeDevice(INDIServerConnection connection, INDIDevice device)
      Called when a device is removed from the Connection

    • Method Detail

      • newDevice

        void newDevice(INDIServerConnection connection,
             INDIDevice device)
        Called when a new Device is added to the Connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection to which the device is added.
        device - The device that has been added.

      • removeDevice

        void removeDevice(INDIServerConnection connection,
                INDIDevice device)
        Called when a device is removed from the Connection
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection from which the device is being removed.
        device - The device being removed.

      • connectionLost

        void connectionLost(INDIServerConnection connection)
        Called when the connection is lost (explicity or not).
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection that has been lost.

      • newMessage

        void newMessage(INDIServerConnection connection,
              java.util.Date timestamp,
              java.lang.String message)
        Called when the message of the Connection is changed.
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection of whose message has changed.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the message.
        message - The message.
